https://tmrev.io/movie/12679-Castro 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/4mxtdFlEuT9ghsf7zRPS9x5NzPR.jpg Four characters are looking for a man called Castro, but we don't know why. For some mysterious reason, Castro is running. He has left his life behind, and survives by hiding in a room in a small city. He is basically alone, but someone has appeared in his life, Celia. She is young, beautiful, and sometimes cruel.
